t: Mary Macleod's Shortbread wholesale products
s: Joy and butter make everything better. Mary Macleod believed it, and we’re pretty sure you will too. When Mary opened Canada’s first shortbread bakery in 1981, she did it with an uncompromising commitment to quality and unconditional love of real creamery butter.

t: Anniversary Story – Mary Macleod's Shortbread
s: We at Mary Macleod's Shortbread are continuing to bake shortbread cookies Mary's way. Armed with our recipe, and using her methods, we are continuously perfecting this timeless cookie. And we can't thank you, our loyal customers, enough for being a part of carrying on this tradition.
